ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Try 22 damage with an archery skill of 34 but with a ruff oak bow - that really adds up.  Experimenting with the ranger class last night in Oasis was quite
ygData.messageBody:
Try 22 damage with an archery skill of 34 but with a ruff oak bow - that
really adds up. Experimenting with the ranger class last night in Oasis was
quite satisfying. Root the croc, hit it with my bow, in between shots hit
it with a fireball - repeat until out of mana.

I solo'd a yellow deep water caiman, had it to 50% hp before I ran out of
mana, then engaged hand-to-hand. Thats big advantage. Those guys are tuff
it reduced me to 2 bubbles before I killed it.

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 3:54 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Archery
>
> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>
> Bows and arrows RULE!! With a little bit of work you can get your
> fletching
> skill up high enough to make more arrows than you know what to do with, or
>
> heck they only cost 1sp at the dealer. 9 points damage every time with an
>
> archery skill of only 35 adds up in the long run.
>
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;
